content: It would be better to overcome primitive traits in one's DNA by recognizing the more advanced side. You have to focus with a certain intention on your humanoid interior until you find that side. It's reported to give a tremendous feeling. Compare it to a human being, who has a lot of simian DNA. A human may have almost 99 % DNA of that of a chimpansee. As a result his body has a lot of hair, not to mention a host of other characterial traits. He should not behave accordingly. The same goes for a reptilian, who is more than the small amount of DNA that comes from a reptilian animal.

content: There is a way to fight reptoids. Address the reptoid heart inside the EBA. Ask the reptoid heart to be in touch with all other hearts like itself. Ask it to tell the other hearts to become the opposite of light (de-photonize). Addressing the heart can be done via speech in the mind's right hemisphere -- where the speech center is located. It's worth it. After a couple of years, there should be no more reptoid presence on Earth.
